SEARCH
Package entity

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
entity.UserAccount
entity.Manager
public class Manager extends UserAccount
The Manager class extends the UserAccount class and represents a manager responsible for overseeing a housing project. It contains methods to handle tasks such as creating and editing project listings, managing assigned projects and many more The manager can only handle one project at a time, and any new project creation will be restricted if they are already managing an existing project.

      NRIC - the NRIC of the manager
      age - the age of the manager
      maritalStatus - the marital status of the manager

    • Manager

      public Manager(String name, String NRIC, int age, String maritalStatus, String password)
      Constructs a new Manager with the specified personal details and password. Used when loading from csv.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the manager
      NRIC - the NRIC of the manager
      age - the age of the manager
      maritalStatus - the marital status of the manager
      password - the password for the manager's account

    • createProjectListing

      public void createProjectListing(Database db)
      Creates a new project listing in the database. The manager must not already be handling a project to create a new one.
      Parameters:
      db - the database where the project listing will be added

    • viewRegistration

      public boolean viewRegistration()
      Displays the registration list of the officer registration.
      Returns:
      true if the registration list was successfully displayed; false if no project is being handled by the manager.

    • viewApplication

      public boolean viewApplication()
      Displays the application list of the project currently being handled by the manager.
      Returns:
      true if the application list was successfully displayed; false if no project is being handled by the manager.

      Assigns an officer to a project by approving a registration form.
      Parameters:
      db - The Database object containing the officer list and project list.

    • manageApplicationForm

      public void manageApplicationForm()
      Manages the application form process for a project, allowing the manager to approve or reject application forms.

    • viewWithdrawalRequest

      public boolean viewWithdrawalRequest()
      Views the withdrawal request list for the project the manager is handling.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal requests were successfully viewed, false if the manager is not handling any project.

    • manageWithdrawalRequest

      public void manageWithdrawalRequest(Database db)
      Manages withdrawal requests for the project the manager is handling. The method allows the manager to approve or reject withdrawal requests based on the application ID and reason.
      Parameters:
      db - The Database object containing the list of projects and applications.

    • viewAllEnquiries

      public void viewAllEnquiries()
      View enquiries of all projects.

      public void generateApplicantBookingReport(Database db)
      Generates a report of applicants' flat bookings under the project the manager is handling.
      Parameters:
      db - The Database object containing the list of flat bookings and related data.
